      • numberVacant

        public int numberVacant()
        Returns the number of vacant freeCells *and* columns

      • autoMoveAvailable

        public Move autoMoveAvailable()
        Returns a Move object that can be auto-played in the given context, based on the logic that "A card is unneeded when no lower-rank cards of the opposite color remain in the playing area". If no auto-moves are available, then null is returned.

      • hasWon
